ARABIC: فَأَلْقَوْا۟ حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ ٱلْغَٰلِبُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They threw down their ropes and staffs and said, 'By the might of Pharaoh we are the winners.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So they cast their ropes and rods, and said: "By the glory of Pharaoh, we shall be victorious."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon they threw down their ropes and their rods, and said: "By the glory of Pharaoh, we shall prevail."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: So they cast down their ropes and staffs saying, "By the honor of the Pharaoh we shall certainly become the winners".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they threw down their ropes and their staves and exclaimed, “By the honour of Firaun, indeed victory is ours!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, they threw their ropes and their sticks, and said: "By the might of Fir`awn, it is we who will certainly win!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So they cast down their cords and their rods and said: By Firon's power, we shall most surely be victorious.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So they cast their ropes and their staffs, and said, 'By the might of Pharaoh we shall be the victors.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then they threw down their cords and their staves and said: By Pharaoh's might, lo! we verily are the winners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So they cast down their ropes and staffs, and said, "By Pharaoh's honour, we shall surely win."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they cast their cords and their staves, and said: by the might of Fir'awn, verily we! we shall be the winners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So they threw down their sticks and ropes, and said, ‘By the might of Pharaoh, we shall surely be victorious!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they threw their ropes and their rods, and said: "By the might of Pharaoh, it is we who will certainly win!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they threw their ropes and their sticks, and said: "By the might of Fir'aun (Pharaoh), it is we who will certainly win!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So they cast their ropes and staffs, saying: 'By Pharaoh's might, we shall be the victors'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So they threw their ropes and their sticks, and said, “By the majesty of Pharaoh, we will be the winners.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said, "By the might of Pharaoh, indeed it is we who are predominant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:44] So they cast their ropes and their staffs, and said, ‘By the power of Pharaoh we shall surely be the victors!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Then they threw down their cords and their staves) 72 ropes and 72 staffs (and said) i.e. the wizards said: (By Pharaoh's might, lo! we verily are the winners) against Moses. 409
